item.title: 西太平洋银行第三季度利润稳定，得益于资本收益增加
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp）周一表示，由于资本和对冲存款收益的增加抵消了支出和不良贷款的增加，该行第三季度净利润与去年同期基本持平。【原文：Australia's Westpac Banking Corp said on Monday its third-quarter net profit was largely in line with a year ago, as higher earnings on capital and hedged deposits offset rising expenses and bad loans.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美国软着陆希望提振新兴市场资产
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，美联储戴利称是时候考虑调整借贷成本了
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周日在接受《金融时报》采访时表示，现在是时候考虑将借贷成本从目前的 5.25% 调整到 5.5% 了。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly said it is time to consider adjusting borrowing costs from their current range of 5.25% to 5.5%, in an interview with the Financial Times published on Sunday.】

item.title: 解说员：加拿大为何即将发生史无前例的铁路停工事件
item.description: 加拿大的两大铁路公司--加拿大国家铁路公司和加拿大堪萨斯太平洋铁路公司--首次濒临同时停工的边缘，这可能造成价值数十亿美元的经济损失。【原文：For the first time, Canada's two main railway companies - Canadian National Railway and Canadian Pacific Kansas City - are on the verge of a simultaneous labor stoppage that could inflict billions of dollars' worth of economic damage.】

item.title: 必和必拓埃斯孔迪达铜矿工会警告可能重新发起罢工
item.description: 必和必拓位于智利的埃斯孔迪达铜矿工会周日在给会员的备忘录中说，如果公司不尽快 "纠正其在合同谈判中的立场"，工会可能会在当天晚些时候重新发起罢工。【原文：The union at BHP's giant Escondida copper mine in Chile said on Sunday in a memo to its members that it could relaunch a strike later in the day if the company does not "rectify its position" over contract talks as soon as possible.】

item.title: 消息人士称帝亚吉欧在德里警方调查中提交财务文件
item.description: 一位熟知内情的消息人士称，烈酒集团帝亚吉欧印度分公司已提交了新德里反腐败警方要求的财务文件，调查涉及城市机构的计费和折扣行为。【原文：Spirits group Diageo's Indian unit has submitted financial documents sought by New Delhi anti-corruption police in an investigation related to billing and discount practices involving city agencies, a source familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 韩国人工智能芯片制造商 Rebellions 和 Sapeon 同意合并
item.description: 韩国人工智能芯片制造商 Rebellions Inc 和 Sapeon Korea Inc 周日表示，两家私营公司已签署最终合并协议。【原文：South Korean artificial-intelligence chip makers Rebellions Inc and Sapeon Korea Inc have signed a definitive merger agreement, the privately held companies said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪计划在卡拉奇建汽车厂，作为进军巴基斯坦的一部分
item.description: 中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪（002594.SZ）周六宣布，计划在巴基斯坦开设一家汽车生产厂，并将通过与 Mega Motors 的合作开始销售三款车型。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD (002594.SZ) on Saturday announced plans to open a car production plant in Pakistan, where it will also start selling three models through a partnership with Mega Motors.】

item.title: X 关闭在巴西的业务 "立即生效
item.description: X 声称，一名法官威胁该公司的一名法律代表说，如果不服从命令撤下一些内容，就逮捕他。【原文：X claims a judge threatened one of its legal representatives with arrest if it did not comply with orders to take down some content.】

item.title: 加拿大 CPKC 在停工迫在眉睫之前扩大货运禁运范围
item.description: 加拿大堪萨斯城太平洋铁路公司周六表示，如果与其加拿大工会的谈判未能取得进展，该公司将从周二开始停止任何从加拿大出发的新铁路货运，并停止所有运往加拿大的美国新货运。【原文：Canadian Pacific Kansas City said on Saturday it would halt any new rail shipments originating in Canada, and all new U.S. shipments destined for Canada starting on Tuesday if talks with its Canadian labour union fail to progress.】

item.title: 富士康被报道拒绝已婚妇女后，其负责人为印度招聘辩护
item.description: 据路透社报道，苹果公司的供应商富士康拒绝已婚妇女从事 iPhone 组装工作，在新德里下令进行调查之后，富士康董事长周六为其招聘行为进行了辩护。【原文：Foxconn's chairman on Saturday defended its hiring practices after New Delhi ordered investigations following a Reuters report that the Apple supplier rejects married women from iPhone assembly jobs.】

item.title: 保时捷同意为 Varta 重组交易提供资金
item.description: 德国电池制造商 Varta 周六表示，它已与债权人达成重组协议，并邀请跑车制造商保时捷拯救这家濒临破产的企业。【原文：German battery maker Varta said on Saturday it had reached a restructuring agreement with its creditors, bringing on sports car manufacturer Porsche to save the ailing business.】

item.title: 星巴克因涉嫌窃取咖啡味口红概念再次被起诉
item.description: 星巴克第三次被一家公司起诉，该公司指控星巴克窃取了其咖啡味唇膏和唇彩的概念。【原文：Starbucks has been sued for a third time by a company that accused the coffee chain of stealing its concept for coffee-flavored lipstick and lip gloss.】

item.title: 文件显示，Tempur Sealy 收购床垫公司的交易旨在 "消除 "竞争
item.description: 据德克萨斯州法官公布的一份文件显示，床垫制造商 Tempur Sealy International 拟斥资 40 亿美元收购零售商 Mattress Firm，目的是 "消除未来的竞争"。【原文：Mattress maker Tempur Sealy International's proposed $4-billion takeover of retailer Mattress Firm is intended to "eliminate future competition", according to a document unsealed by a Texas judge.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行反诉前首席财务官 Ahn，称其违反行为准则
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行周五对下台的首席财务官 Nadine Ahn 提起反诉，详细说明了对她涉嫌与一名下属有亲密关系的内部调查结果，并指责她违反了银行的行为准则。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada filed a countersuit against ousted CFO Nadine Ahn on Friday, detailing findings of its internal investigation into her alleged intimate relationship with a subordinate, and accusing her of breaching its code of conduct.】

item.title: 比特币上涨 5.17% 至 59 609 美元
item.description: 比特币是世界上最大、最知名的加密货币，格林尼治标准时间周五（2013 GMT）上涨 5.17% 至 59 609 美元。【原文：Bitcoin, the world's biggest and best-known cryptocurrency, rose 5.17% to $59,609 at 2013 GMT on Friday.】

item.title: OpenAI 封杀伊朗组织针对美国大选的 ChatGPT 账户
item.description: OpenAI 周五表示，它已关闭了一个伊朗组织的账户，因为该组织使用其 ChatGPT 聊天机器人生成了旨在影响美国总统选举和其他问题的内容。【原文：OpenAI said on Friday it had taken down accounts of an Iranian group for using its ChatGPT chatbot to generate content meant for influencing the U.S. presidential election and other issues.】

item.title: 独家报道波音公司和洛克希德-马丁公司就将 ULA 出售给 Sierra Space 公司进行谈判
item.description: 波音公司和洛克希德-马丁公司正在商谈将其火箭发射合资企业联合发射联盟（United Launch Alliance）出售给塞拉太空公司（Sierra Space）的事宜。【原文：Boeing and Lockheed Martin are in talks to sell their rocket-launching joint venture United Launch Alliance to Sierra Space, two people familiar with the discussions said.】

item.title: 法官暂时阻止迪斯尼体育流媒体企业的发展
item.description: 周五的一份法庭文件显示，一名美国法官暂时阻止了华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）体育流媒体企业的启动。【原文：A U.S. judge has temporarily blocked the launch of Walt Disney's sports streaming venture, according to a court filing on Friday.】

item.title: 美国国务院批准可能向加拿大出售战术导弹
item.description: 五角大楼周五表示，美国国务院批准了一项向加拿大出售战术导弹及相关支持的对外军售计划，金额为2.646亿美元。【原文：The U.S. State Department approved a foreign military sale to Canada of tactical missiles and related support for $264.6 million, the Pentagon said on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比：不希望紧缩政策超过必要的时间 - NPR
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周五表示，美国经济并未出现过热迹象，因此央行官员应警惕将限制性政策维持超过必要的时间。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee on Friday said the U.S. economy is not showing signs of overheating, so central bank officials should be wary of keeping restrictive policy in place longer than necessary.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州医院被查封，破产的 Steward Health Care 出售医生网络
item.description: 破产医院运营商 Steward Health Care 周五获得破产法官批准，将其全国范围内的医生网络出售给一家私募股权买家，而其出售马萨诸塞州医院的努力停滞不前，导致州政府介入并查封了一家医院。【原文：Bankrupt hospital operator Steward Health Care received a bankruptcy judge’s approval on Friday to sell its nationwide physician network to a private equity buyer while its stalled efforts to sell Massachusetts hospitals caused the state to step in and seize one hospital.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会称汽车经销商阿斯伯里歧视黑人和拉丁裔消费者
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周五指控汽车经销商阿斯伯里汽车公司歧视黑人和拉丁裔消费者，向他们提供不需要的高价附加服务，使他们的车价增加数千美元。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission alleged on Friday that auto dealer Asbury Automotive discriminated against Black and Latino consumers by targeting them with unwanted and higher-priced add-ons that add thousands to the price of their cars.】

item.title: 飓风贝里尔可能对 7 月份美国劳动力市场产生轻微影响
item.description: 德克萨斯州 7 月份的失业率略有上升，表明飓风贝里尔对劳动力市场的影响不大，同时也证实了上个月美国就业增长的急剧放缓。【原文：Unemployment in Texas rose moderately in July, suggesting that Hurricane Beryl had a minor impact on the labor market and confirming the sharp slowdown in U.S. job growth last month.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，万事达卡计划全球裁员 3
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引一位发言人的话报道，支付处理商万事达卡计划将其全球员工人数削减 3%。【原文：Payments processor Mastercard plans to cut its global workforce by 3%, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing a spokesperson.】

item.title: 加州大麻种植者感受低价和野火带来的热量
item.description: 加利福尼亚州的小规模大麻种植者被毁灭性野火造成的作物损失和不断下滑的价格压垮，纷纷宣布退出。【原文：Small-scale cannabis farmers in California are calling it quits, crushed by crop damage from devastating wildfires and sliding prices, and industry experts expect the exodus to continue near-term in the largest pot market in the United States.】

item.title: 标普将华纳兄弟发现公司的前景展望下调至 "负面"，原因是有线电视业务下滑
item.description: S&P 公司周五将华纳兄弟发现公司的前景展望从 "稳定 "下调至 "负面"，理由是该媒体公司的有线电视业务因艰难的广告市场和断线而下滑。【原文：S&P lowered its outlook on Warner Bros Discovery on Friday to "negative" from "stable", citing declines in the media company's cable TV business due to a tough advertising market and cord-cutting.】

item.title: 瑞银将剥离量化投资策略业务
item.description: 瑞士投资银行瑞银集团（UBS）周五表示，将把定量投资策略（QIS）业务剥离给 Manteio Partners LLC 及其关联公司。【原文：Swiss investment bank UBS said on Friday it will divest its Quantitative Investment Strategies (QIS) business to Manteio Partners LLC and its affiliates.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士：中国在暂停黄金进口后发布新配额
item.description: 四位知情人士告诉路透社，尽管黄金价格屡创新高，但预计需求将有所恢复，因此中国几家银行已从央行获得了新的黄金进口配额。【原文：Several Chinese banks have been given new gold import quotas from the central bank, anticipating revived demand despite record high prices, four sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 8 月消费者信心指数上升；通胀预期稳定
item.description: 周五的一项调查显示，8月份美国消费者情绪上升，而对未来一年及以后的通胀预期保持不变。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment rose in August, while inflation expectations remained unchanged over the next year and beyond, a survey showed on Friday.】
